Characters
View On FortressMaximus.io

Warpath - Confident Sharpshooter

  1. Does Warpath/Acid Storm prevent the initial two battle flips for defense/attack respectively? In other words, are the initial two battle flips considered bold/tough?
    No.
  2. If my opponent has more than 1 card in their scrap pile with two blue battle icons, can they choose to do 1 damage to each of two of their characters, or is all the damage done to the same character?
    They can choose individually for each card.
